pullrequest.title: Apply Force/Torque dialog: Activate window when visual clicked

content.raw: While preparing the next pull request I realized why this hadn't been done before. If you activate the dialog when selecting the model, it becomes very hard to enter translate/rotate modes and manipulate the object. I'll remove this in the next pr if you don't mind. Let me know if you have another idea.
